p.e:
TIME [AREA.HOUR VALUE]
SKYBOX
SEASON [AREA.SEASON VALUE]
WEATHER

EVENTS

RESET AREA

b: when starts then is area.month == [month]
when starts then is area.day == [day]
when starts then is area.hour == [hour]
when touches hand and is dev then is area.hour ++
when is area.hour >= 25 then is area.hour == 0
when any state grabbed then become next
when starts then is not dev
when starts then is dev
when grabbed and is dev then reset area
when any state is area.night = 1 then is area.lightsa == random(0 1)
when any state is area.night = 1 then is area.lightsb == random(0 1)
when any state is area.night = 1 then is area.lightsc == random(0 1)
when any state is area.night = 0 then is area.lightsa == 0
when any state is area.night = 0 then is area.lightsb == 0
when any state is area.night = 0 then is area.lightsc == 0
when any state touches hand and is dev then become next
when starts then is area.night == 1
when touches hand then become next
when touches hand then become previous
when starts then is area.night == 0
when any state is area.hour >= 0 and is area.hour <= 3 then become 1
when starts then call me 0-4
when starts then is area.night == 1
when any state is area.hour >= 5 and is area.hour <= 8 then become 2
when starts then call me 5-8
when starts then is area.night == 1
when any state is area.hour >= 9 and is area.hour <= 12 then become 3
when starts then call me 9-12
when starts then is area.night == 0
when any state is area.hour >= 13 and is area.hour <= 16 then become 4
when starts then call me 1p-4p
when starts then is area.night == 0
when starts then call me 5p-9p
when any state is area.hour >= 17 and is area.hour <= 20 then become 5
when starts then is area.night == 0
when starts then call me 10p-12a
when any state is area.hour >= 21 and is area.hour <= 24 then become 6
when starts then is area.night == 1
when any state is area.month >= 2 and is area.month <= 4 then is area.season == 1
when any state is area.month >= 5 and is area.month <= 7 then is area.season == 2
when any state is area.month >= 8 and is area.month <= 10 then is area.season == 3
when any state is area.month >= 11 and is area.month<= 12 then is area.season == 4
when any state is area.month = 1 then is area.season == 4
when touches hand and is dev then is area.season ++
when is area.season >= 5 then is area.season == 1
when any state starts then end loop
when starts then call me sunny, end loop
when starts then loop park wind with 5
when any state is area.clear and is not area.night then become 2
when starts then call me night, end loop
when starts then loop evening cricket with 15
when any state is area.clear and is area.night then become 3
when starts then call me snow, end loop
when starts then loop winter wind with 50
when any state is area.snow then become 4
when starts then call me rain
when starts then loop city rain 2 with 75
when any state is area.rain then become 5
when starts then is weather == random (1 10)
when is weather >= 1 and is weather <= 5 then become 2
when is weather >= 6 and is weather <= 8 then become 3
when is weather >= 9 and is weather <= 10 then become 5
when any state touches hand and is dev then become next
when starts then is not area.storm
when starts then is not area.rain
when starts then is not area.snow
when starts then is not area.clear
when starts then call me sun
when starts then is not area.rain
when starts then is not area.storm
when starts then is not area.snow
when starts then is area.clear
when starts then call me rain
when starts then is area.rain
when starts then is not area.storm
when starts then is not area.snow
when starts then is not area.clear
when starts then call me storm
when starts then is area.rain

when starts then is not area.snow
when starts then is not area.clear
when starts then call me snow
when starts then is area.snow
when starts then is not area.rain
when starts then is not area.storm
when starts then is not area.clear
when touches hand and is dev then is sound ++
when is sound >= 2 then is not sound
when touches hand then end loop
when starts then is not sound
when starts then allow any destruction
when is area.month = 12 then is area.christmas = 1
when is area.month = 10 then is area.halloween = 1
